title: CyberLink PowerCinema 5 Retail+Keygen
description:
CyberLink PowerCinema 5
=======================
***********************
The TV Entertainment Center for the Digital Home

Schedule, record, and watch your favorite TV shows

PowerCinema puts you in complete control, either via remote control or a mouse and keyboard. You can surf, record, and watch TV via easy onscreen navigation. Your CyberLink TV tuner card&#039;s built-in radio receiver also offers access to FM radio. Here&#039;s what you can do:

    * Enable your PC to watch TV and listen to radio
    * Record your favorite TV shows automatically via EPG
    * Search for recorded programs on your computer
    * Output to widescreen TVs and monitors
    * Experience virtual surround effects for TV and radio


Live TV (and Radio) Recording and Playback
